titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A declaration of great troubles pretended against the realme by a number of seminarie priests and Iesuits, sent, and very secretly dispersed in the same, to worke great treasons vnder a false pretence of religion, with a prouision very necessary for remedy thereof Published by this her Maiesties proclamation.
Proclamations. 1591-10-18
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
